plot: A deadly nest of vampires arrive in Midnight, eager to reunite with Lem, Manfred suspects there's more to their arrival and joins forces with Olivia.

This series is based on Charlaine Harris's books which take place in a small Texas town, built at a crossroad, whose residents are all a little supernatural. Witches, were tigers, vampires, and psychics are among the rogues gallery who live in Midnight, TX. Together, they solve mysteries, build relationships, and have weird adventures.—Leslie Hertz Firestone
